name: Baldi had enough!
description:
It's been a year since you left Baldi's schoolhouse

and Baldi has not let go of anything. You decided to

go back to the school and checked what's up with

the others. Stuff has changed since you've left.

Principal and Arts and crafters ran away from the

school for a reason...

To escape just collect the 7 notebooks like

always.

Credits:

Porky powers - for the Baldi 1.4.3 open source.

mimukyu - for the music.

Mystman12 - for the original Baldi's basics

uber duck - for the Baldi and bully text to speech.

Feulfire for voicing playtime.

SplintaDinta For the Baldi model.
